oc_lettings_site package¶

Submodules¶

oc_lettings_site.views module¶

oc_lettings_site.views.custom_404(request, exception)[source]¶

View function to display a custom 404 error page.

Paramètres:

  • request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

  • exception (Exception) – The exception that triggered the 404 error.

Renvoie:

A rendered HTML response for the custom 404 error page.

Type renvoyé:

HttpResponse

oc_lettings_site.views.custom_500(request, exception)[source]¶

View function to display a custom 500 error page.

Paramètres:

  • request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

  • exception (Exception) – The exception that triggered the 500 error.

Renvoie:

A rendered HTML response for the custom 500 error page.

Type renvoyé:

HttpResponse

oc_lettings_site.views.index(request)[source]¶

View function to display the index page.

Paramètres:

request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

Renvoie:

A rendered HTML response for the index page.

Type renvoyé:

HttpResponse
